titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for making of severall pieces of forreigne coyne to be currant in this kingdome, for the furtherance of the trade thereof.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Leonard Lichfield, printer to the Vniversity,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: ... Oxford, the fourth day of March, 1643.
The dates are given according to Lady Day dating.
Arms 37; Steele notation: Councell, hereby payments.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
